channel.title: Need help with some coding
channel.description: Okay, i want to make it so when i use a dye with a white partyhat, i get that colored partyhat. I saw a tut on how to do this a while back and it was called something like "using one item with another item to give you a certain item" If anyone can find me a tut or tell me how to do that, ill be very grateful Thx alot guys :)

item.title: Need help with some coding

item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

Okay, i want to make it so when i use a dye with a white partyhat, i get that colored partyhat.
